title.en: Anata wa Boku Dake no Hana

description.en:
1) You Are My Flower
Yuuto has been living for years with Hisataka but he's wondering what are his true feelings for his lover since in the beginning, he accepted the relationship without being in love with Hisataka...

2) Moving Forward Hand in Hand
After changing shifting seats in the classroom, the shy boy finally got to sit next to the prince of campus. Will he be able to look beyond the facade and see him for his real self. 

3) It's Still Impossible to Turn Them into Memories
He got the biggest shock of his life when he turned up for a rock concert only to discover his friend has invited his past lover without knowing that. Now they have to pretend to be nice to each other despite the bitter break up in the past. 

4) I Want You Only
He doesn't quite get it why he is always getting dumped even though he is pretty popular. He jokingly tell his childhood friend that he might as well turn gay to avoid this terrible fate. Surprisingly, his friend volunteered for the position. 

5) Feelings of a Flowers
A mutual lets on that Hisataka is actually really popular with the ladies and Yuuto is finding it hard to believe, until he sees it for himself.

links.amz: https://www.amazon.co.jp/あなたは僕だけの花-やまかみ梨由-ebook/dp/B00BFNJMP0
